other_title: 科学忍者隊ガッチャマン (Japanese)
plot: A new threat appears all over the world in the form of the terrorist group known as the Galactor. To combat the forces of Galactor, well-renowned scientist Kouzaburou Nanbu unleashes the Science Ninja Team Gatchaman, a team of five young heroes skilled in the art of ninjutsu and dressed in unique bird-like costumes.
opening_theme: "Taosozu! Galactor" (倒せ! ギャラクター; "Destroy Galactor!") by Columbia Yurikago-kai (eps 1-23)
"Gatchaman no Uta" (ガッチャマンの歌; "Gatchaman Song") by Masato Shimon (eps 24-105)
ending_theme: "Gatchaman no Uta" (ガッチャマンの歌; Gatchaman Song) by Masato Shimon (eps 1-23)
"Taosozu! Galactor" (倒せ! ギャラクター; "Destroy Galactor!") by Columbia Yurikago-kai (eps 24-105)
